results.title: Bunga our haven
results.creator_credit: Pam Enting, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Pam Enting and some 19 other families are part owners of what they call ‘Bunga Haven’. She tells the story of how this arrangement came to be, and of the environmental battles that were undertaken to save the lake.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Pam Enting, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Pam Enting and some 19 other families are part owners of what they call ‘Bunga Haven’. She tells the story of how this arrangement came to be, and of the environmental battles that were undertaken to save the lake.

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2008)
results.brief_description: Eight members of the general public in Melbourne create stories about the things the resonate strongly with them, whether that is the sense of home, the love of family or cherished memories.

results.title: Whatever happened to La Pérouse?
results.creator_credit: Peter Kiernan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In addition to being a cherished family home, La Pérouse in Heidelberg, Victoria, is a historic building with a rich history, full of opera singers, vaudeville stars, and driving lessons.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Kiernan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: In addition to being a cherished family home, La Pérouse in Heidelberg, Victoria, is a historic building with a rich history, full of opera singers, vaudeville stars, and driving lessons.

results.title: The Travelling divorcees
results.creator_credit: Michelle Rayner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Michelle Rayner reflects on the evolution of the marriage between Patricia and Michael, her parents. Throughout the years they have gone through many changes both personally and as a couple, and often reflecting the times.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michelle Rayner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Getting off map 30
results.creator_credit: Anna Poletti, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For the fourteen years that Anna Poletti has lived in Melbourne, her various residences have had one thing in common - you can locate them all on map 30 of the Melways street directory. She pays homage to the streets and intersections of her neighbourhood.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Anna Poletti, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Forgotten corner
results.creator_credit: Samara McIlroy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘A little further up the road and a little further into the wilderness than you think.’ Samara McIlroy pays loving tribute to her special corner of Victoria, a place where you can still drop in for a ‘cuppa’ without ringing first.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Samara McIlroy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My ambitions
results.creator_credit: David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Since David Clune first travelled to Japan at 16, he developed a thirst for travel that has never been quenched. In all his travels, he has witnessed suffering amongst the beauty and it has encouraged in him a desire to make a difference, even though he is content in Australia…for now.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Since David Clune first travelled to Japan at 16, he developed a thirst for travel that has never been quenched. In all his travels, he has witnessed suffering amongst the beauty and it has encouraged in him a desire to make a difference, even though he is content in Australia…for now.

results.title: Italian settlement in the Yarra Valley
results.creator_credit: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
